testCases.theoreticalBasis: Ionian short — plagal movement as modal color
Ionian seventh — Ionian color with 7ths
Ionian vamp — sustained Ionian color
Ionian foil — authentic cadence is functional, not modal
Dorian long — major IV and bVII with minor tonic
Dorian short — major IV against minor tonic defines Dorian
Dorian seventh — seventh-quality voicings, modal color intact
Dorian vamp — two-chord Dorian vamp
Dorian foil — minor iv pulls toward Aeolian
Omit parent key to force boundary decision between modal and functional

Phrygian short — flat second is the signature degree
